meanings.definition: A type of fungus that grows on grass under snow.
meanings.sent1: The snowmold on the grass looked like tiny white patches.
meanings.sent2: The golf course had to be treated for snowmold to keep the grass healthy.
meanings.sent3: The snowmold on the lawn seemed to be having a winter party.
meanings.sent4: The snowmold spread across the field like a soft, white blanket.
meanings.sent5: I could see the snowmold clearly under the melting snow.

meanings.sent1: If you don't take care of your lawn, it may snowmold.
meanings.sent2: The grass in the park tends to snowmold during the winter months.
meanings.sent3: I hope my yard doesn't snowmold before the spring.
meanings.sent4: Her neglect caused the grass to snowmold quickly.
meanings.sent5: The grass will snowmold if not properly treated.

meanings.definition: The presence of snowmold on grass.
meanings.sent1: The snowmold covering the field was a sign of winter's end.
meanings.sent2: The lawn's snowmold indicated a need for better lawn care.
meanings.sent3: The snowmold on the grass made it look like a snowy wonderland.
meanings.sent4: The snowmold's arrival meant it was time for spring cleaning.
meanings.sent5: The snowmold on the greenery was a beautiful sight after the snow melted.
